name: X-iled
description:
Traverse through an underground dungeon, slaughtering monsters that impede your path. With devastating power harnessed within your cards, rapidly fire your attacks as you ascend through the levels of the mysterious caves, fighting your way out in order to escape. Unleash your fury: slash, bash, and slam enemies into the ground. Exact vengeance on those that imprisoned you for years.

Project was created in part for the requirements for the RIT Game Design & Development MS Capstone project.

Made by Team DND (David Knolls, Nathan Glick, and David Liu).

HOW TO PLAY: Unzip "XiledFinalBuild.zip", and open the "DNDCapstone.exe".

Controls: KB/M & Controllers Supported. Controls can be customized in-game.

===================

- Minimum Requirements -

Platform: Windows

Processor: Intel Core i5

Memory: 8 GB RAM

Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB

Storage: 1.5 GB available space
